member.name: T:Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.DataTransmitInterface.Instance
member.summary: Gets the only instance(Singleton) of ADOHandler class. Users are only able to use ADOHandler thorght this property

member.name: M:Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.DataTransmitInterface.RunAsyncronous(Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.DataRequest)
member.summary: Runs a Shoniz.CMMS.Shared.Framework.DataRequest object asynchronously. and publishes the result whenever it's ready on the IDataProvider object.
member.param: A Shoniz.CMMS.Shared.Framework.IDataProvider object to publish return value from executing SQL command.

member.name: M:Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.DataTransmitInterface.RunImmediately(Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.DataRequest)
member.summary: Processes a Shoniz.CMMS.Shared.Framework.DataRequest object and returns the result immediately.

member.name: T:Shoniz.Common.Data.DynamicDataHelper.IDataObserver
